Sentencas: A solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) unit is constructed with Ni-(Ce,Gd)O2-x as the anode, yttria-stabilized zirconia as the supporting electrolyte, and Cu-added (LaSr)(CoFe)O-3-(Ce,Gd)O2-x as the cathode.
Titulo: Effect of temperature and concentration on reduction and oxidation of NO over SOFC cathode of Cu-added (LaSr)(CoFe)O3-(Ce,Gd)O2-x

Sentencas: Both reduction and oxidation of NO occur and are affected by the concentration of NO.
Titulo: Effect of temperature and concentration on reduction and oxidation of NO over SOFC cathode of Cu-added (LaSr)(CoFe)O3-(Ce,Gd)O2-x

Sentencas: Either reduction or oxidation of NO starts from NO adsorption.
Titulo: Effect of temperature and concentration on reduction and oxidation of NO over SOFC cathode of Cu-added (LaSr)(CoFe)O3-(Ce,Gd)O2-x

Sentencas: NO reduction to generate an electrical current has very much smaller activation energy than NO oxidation to form NO2.
Titulo: Effect of temperature and concentration on reduction and oxidation of NO over SOFC cathode of Cu-added (LaSr)(CoFe)O3-(Ce,Gd)O2-x

Sentencas: With 4% O-2 and 1000 ppm NO, the NO2 yield is relatively small and the temperature effect on NO reduction is positive.
Titulo: Effect of temperature and concentration on reduction and oxidation of NO over SOFC cathode of Cu-added (LaSr)(CoFe)O3-(Ce,Gd)O2-x

Sentencas: These are beneficial for the application of the process of DeNO(x) by SOFC to NO abatement from the lean-burn engine exhausts.
Titulo: Effect of temperature and concentration on reduction and oxidation of NO over SOFC cathode of Cu-added (LaSr)(CoFe)O3-(Ce,Gd)O2-x
